charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1101_010:
While walking through the forest one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a very distinct
voice ring out through the trees.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1101_020:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to see where the voice was
coming from.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_030: Ugh! Seeeriously? How did I lose?!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_040:
There’s no need to get angry. We had a great
battle, didn’t we?
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_050:
I can tell you and your partner have a lot of
trust in each other. You make a good pair.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_060:
*gasp* Whaaat? Did we just get a compliment
from a Champion, Umbreon?
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_070:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t see you
there. Were you watching us battle?
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_080:
Heh, I see those starry eyes! You must’ve been
blown away by my battle prowess, too, huh,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_090:
And now that my popularity’s exploding, you’re
probably dying to know, like, all the juicy deets
about me, right?
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_100:
Well, your wish is my command. Get ready to
hear my suuuper dramatic backstory!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_110: *chuckle* I don’t recall making such a wish.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_120: But if you insist, let’s hear this tale of yours.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_130:
Awright! Sooo, when I was younger, I used to
work as a maid in Master Lear’s castle.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_140:
Y’know, like the classic tale where an orphan
gets, like, taken in by a rich family? Yeah, that
was meee.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_160:
Yep! Betcha didn’t expect that, huh! You don’t
have to, like, feel bad for me or anything, though.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_170:
It was my destiny, y’know? And I’m suuuuper
OK with that!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_180:
When you said “dramatic backstory,” you really
meant it.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_190:
For suuure. Anyways, so when I was little, I had
this suuuper thick accent from the countryside
where I was born.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_200:
I didn’t wanna get teased for it, so I spent, like,
literally foreeever learning how to talk like I
do now.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_210:
But one day, Sawyer called me out on it—
told me I had to drop the slang and speak
more respectfully...
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_0401_230: I couldn’t! I was just a junior maid back then.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_0402_250:
Well, he probably thought I was doing it on
purpose to be rude or something.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_260:
I was freakin’ out ’cause I didn’t know what I was
supposed to do...
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_270: and that’s when Master Lear came to my rescue!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_280:
He told me he liked the way I talked—gave me
his official stamp of approval!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_290: Man, he was so coooool that day...
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_300: Must be a happy memory of yours...
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_310: Huh?! Whoops, totally spaced out there for a sec.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_330:
So, after all thaaat happened, me and Master Lear
started hanging out a bunch.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_340:
We had SO much fun together. Like, seriously.
This was back when Umbreon was still an Eevee.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_350:
I used to talk to him about Master Lear a loooot.
Like, how I hoped he would evolve into his
favorite Evolution and stuff.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_360:
Wishing for an Evolution that will make your
friend happy... That’s so sweet.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_370:
I know, right?! And it probably woulda been if
things hadn’t gone all wrong again!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_380:
’Cause one night, Eevee evolved into Umbreon
outta nowhere!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_390:
I thought we were gonna plan it out and make a
decision together, but nooope! I was, like, super
upset about it.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_410:
Guess who came to my rescue again?!
Master Lear!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_420:
He told me he thought Umbreon was great! All it
took was one word and I went from, like, full-on
despair to, like, suuuper happy!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_430: Man, he was so coooool that day...
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_0401_450: Wha—! Did I just space out again?!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_480: You really do love Lear, don’t you.
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_490: Duh! Sooo yeah, that’s my crazy backstory!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_500:
Well, at least the first chapter, anyways. There’s
still waaay more story left to go!
charaepi_ch0067_01_leader1/2301_1201_510:
My story, featuring Umbreon and Master Lear,
will continue!
